The '''Gift Shop''' is a [[Shop]] that has [[Bundles]] for sale. Items in this shop are available in limited quantities with some of the items having their stock resetting weekly. The currency required for most items are [[Genesis Crystal]]s.

==Purchase with US$==
{{Shop/Header|currency=US$|stock=Limit|note=Contents|class=tdl4}}
{{Shop|Blessing of the Welkin Moon|4.99|None|note=Over a 30-day period: {{Item List|Genesis Crystal*300;Primogem*2700}}}}
{{Shop|Adventurer's Bundle|9.99|None|note=PSN Store Exclusive {{Item List|Acquaint Fate*2;Mora*150,000;Adventurer's Experience*80;Fine Enhancement Ore*50;Northern Smoked Chicken*10;Sautéed Matsutake*10;Sweet Madame*10;Tea Break Pancake*10}}}}
{{Shop/Footer}}

==Genesis Crystal Shop==
Discounts are given in parenthesis.

===Permanent Bundles===
These bundles refresh their stock every week.
{{Shop/Header|currency=Genesis Crystal|stock=Weekly Limit|note=Contents|class=tdl4}}
{{Shop|Starter Supply Bundle|300|1|note={{Item List|Adventurer's Experience*80;Fine Enhancement Ore*40}}}}
{{Shop|Wayfarer's Supply Bundle|980|1|note={{Item List|Hero's Wit*50;Mystic Enhancement Ore*25;Fragile Resin*1;Mora*50,000}}}}
{{Shop|Adventurer's Share Bundle|60|1|note={{Item List|Material Share Bundle*12}}}}
{{Shop/Footer}}
